statements: DELETE FROM park_locations WHERE park_name = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM park_amenities WHERE park_id IN (SELECT park_id FROM public_parks WHERE park_area > 500);
DELETE FROM park_amenities WHERE category = 'Outdoor' AND amenity_name = 'Picnic Area';
DELETE FROM visitor_statistics WHERE park_id = 3 AND date_visited = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM amenities WHERE amenity_name = 'Swimming Pool';
DELETE FROM park_staff WHERE staff_name = 'John Doe' AND role = 'Ranger';
